pages.text: The Adjustable Lamp is a very useful block. You can adjust the brightness of the lamp in two ways: $(li)Right clicking will increase the brightness of the lamp by 1. $(li)Providing a redstone signal will lock the lamp at a brightness equal to the signal strength.

pages.title: More Details
pages.text: The lamp will emit a comparator signal equal to it's brightness level.$(br)Due to limitations in Minecraft, lamps of brightness 14 and 15 output the same amount of light. Redstone functionality is still retained appropriately though.

pages.title: More Details
pages.text: Speaking of Redstone functionality, $(t:Like the Copper Bulb should have)$(6)the lamp updates every tick.$(/t)$(0) This allows for much smoother animation and more precise timing for redstone contraptions.
